mapper.insert: insert into room_reservation(reserve_seq, room_subject, room_content, room_status, start_dt, end_dt, reg_dt, rgtr_id ) values( reserve_seq.nextval, #{roomSubject}, #{roomContent}, #{roomStatus}, TO_DATE(#{startDt},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), TO_DATE(#{endDt},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), SYSDATE, #{userSeq} )
